author: AAA3A
name: TicketTool
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog! 
Do `[p]help` to get the list of commands and their description. 
It does not use user data.
short: A cog to manage a ticket system!
description: Have you ever wanted to set up a ticket system, with many options for the user and the support team, on your server? Then this cog is for you! It has many settings, buttons, a reaction to create the ticket, many commands working in the ticket channel, different roles with access to different options...
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
